definition: Su Shi (1037-1101), also known as Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡[Su1 Dong1 po1] northern Song Dynasty writer and calligrapher/one of the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and one of the Eight Giants of Tang and Song Prose 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 Ba1 Da4 jia1]
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
crossbar in carriage front

sentences.english: Su Shi's disposition core is sincere.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾的性格核心是真率。

sentences.english: There are more than one hundred food poems in sushi's poetry.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾詩集中有一百多首食品詩。

sentences.english: The contents of both Su's and Xin's were profound and abundant.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾與辛棄疾的送別詞內容豐富，氣象萬千。

sentences.english: Su Shi's criticism against Liu Yong was not aimed at his "gracefulness", but his conformity to vulgarity instead.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾批評柳永並非針對“婉約”，而是針對“從俗”。

sentences.english: Su Shi's cultural disposition was always considered that is broad-minded .
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾的文化性格一向被認爲是曠達。

sentences.english: As the head of "the Top Four"in handwriting in Song dynasty , SU Shi achieved outstanding achievements.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾作爲書法“宋四大家”之首，其成就十分顯著。

sentences.english: The Travel Notes to Shizhong Mount shows Su Shi's implicit rebel after being demoted.
sentences.chinese: 《石鐘山記》是蘇軾遭貶後的含蓄反抗。

sentences.english: The understanding to live permeates SuShi' poem Shuidiaogetou .
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾的《水調歌頭》滲透了他對生命的理解。

sentences.english: The bad criticism to The Selection of Literary Works by Sushi, affected his spread.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾對《文選》惡評頗多，影響了《文選》的流佈。

sentences.english: The first chapter illustrates key concept of Qinghuan.
sentences.chinese: 第一章闡述蘇軾“清歡”的核心概念。

sentences.english: As a typical scholar, Sushi's political psychology was representative.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾是士人羣體的一個典型代表，其心態頗具典型性。

sentences.english: Undoubtedly, Southern poems functioned as beneficial practice of SuShi′s poem writing.
sentences.chinese: 南行詩對於蘇軾詩歌創作的練筆作用應該得到肯定。

sentences.english: Wutai Poem Case was the turning-point in Su Shi's political psychology.
sentences.chinese: 烏臺詩案構成蘇軾政治心態演變的轉折點。

sentences.english: Self-inscription of Jinshan Portrait can be viewed as a summary of SU Shi's whole life.
sentences.chinese: 《自題金山畫像》可以看成蘇軾對一生的總結。

sentences.english: The object that this text studies is Su Shi's phrase of Yuan-You.
sentences.chinese: 本文所研究的對象是蘇軾的元祐詞。

sentences.english: The second part is the arrangement of Sushi opera of Yuan and Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是關於元明蘇軾題材戲曲作品的概述。

definition: Su Dongpo, another name for Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼 (1037-1101), northern Song writer and calligrapher
Huang Tingjian (1045-1105), Song poet and calligrapher
Dongpo District of Meishan City 眉山市[Mei2 shan1 Shi4], Sichuan
Huangzhou district of Huanggang city 黃岡市|黄冈市[Huang2 gang1 shi4], Hubei
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse
Ouyang Xiu (1007-1072), Northern Song dynasty prose writer and historian
grass script/cursive script (Chinese calligraphic style)
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
Sima Guang (1019-1086), politician and historian of Northern Song, author of Comprehensive Mirror for aid in Government 資治通鑒|资治通鉴
short comments/preface and postscript
bard/poet
verse/CL:行[hang2]
writer of 詞|词[ci2] (a kind of Classical Chinese poem)/person of literary talent
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
Yan Zhenqing (709-785), a leading calligrapher of the Tang Dynasty
landscape painting
